sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO YE167440 ( DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , CONB_SEIL_NUM , ATTR_YR , CONB_CDDL , USE_AMT , PYR_DDC_AMT , DDC_TRGT_AMT , THC_YR_DDC_AMT_ND_XPS , THC_YR_DDC_AMT , THC_YR_NDUC_EXTN_AMT , THC_YR_NDUC_CRFW_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #systemkey# , #yrtxBlggYr# , #clutSeptCd# , (SELECT COUNT(*)+1 FROM YE167440) , #attrYr# , #conbCddl# , #useAmt# , #pyrDdcAmt# , #ddcTrgtAmt# , #thcYrDdcAmtNdXps# , #thcYrDdcAmt# , #thcYrNducExtnAmt# , #thcYrNducCrfwAmt# , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE YE167440 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# , CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# , CONB_SEIL_NUM=#conbSeilNum# , ATTR_YR=#attrYr# , CONB_CDDL=#conbCddl# , USE_AMT=#useAmt# , PYR_DDC_AMT=#pyrDdcAmt# , DDC_TRGT_AMT=#ddcTrgtAmt# , THC_YR_DDC_AMT_ND_XPS=#thcYrDdcAmtNdXps# , THC_YR_DDC_AMT=#thcYrDdcAmt# , THC_YR_NDUC_EXTN_AMT=#thcYrNducExtnAmt# , THC_YR_NDUC_CRFW_AMT=#thcYrNducCrfwAmt# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND CONB_SEIL_NUM=#conbSeilNum#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM YE167440 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , CONB_SEIL_NUM , ATTR_YR , CONB_CDDL , USE_AMT , PYR_DDC_AMT , DDC_TRGT_AMT , THC_YR_DDC_AMT_ND_XPS , THC_YR_DDC_AMT , THC_YR_NDUC_EXTN_AMT , THC_YR_NDUC_CRFW_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE167440 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND CONB_SEIL_NUM=#conbSeilNum#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , CONB_SEIL_NUM , ATTR_YR , CONB_CDDL , USE_AMT , PYR_DDC_AMT , DDC_TRGT_AMT , THC_YR_DDC_AMT_ND_XPS , THC_YR_DDC_AMT , THC_YR_NDUC_EXTN_AMT , THC_YR_NDUC_CRFW_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE167440 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
SYSTEMKEY LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC , YRTX_BLGG_YR DESC , CLUT_SEPT_CD DESC , CONB_SEIL_NUM DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM YE167440 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
SYSTEMKEY LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
